title: Mob Effect
description: A component that applies a mob effect to entities that get within range.

cooldown_time.title: Cooldown Time
cooldown_time.description: Time in seconds to wait between each application of the effect.

effect_range.title: Effect Range
effect_range.description: How close a hostile entity must be to have the mob effect applied.

effect_time.title: Effect Time
effect_time.description: How long the applied mob effect lasts in seconds.

mob_effect.title: Mob Effect
mob_effect.description: The mob effect that is applied to entities that enter this entities effect range.
